jeffree-star-orgy.name: Orgy
jeffree-star-orgy.description: This makeup palette was released on August 21st, 2020. Described as Jeffree Star's "biggest eyeshadow palette to date, a 30 pan ALL matte orgy of nudes".

colors.name: Glamour Shot
colors.description: Image featured is one of the photos used for the palette's initial promotion, found at https://twitter.com/JeffreeStar/status/1294405026605961217?s=20.

colors.name: YouTube Promo Still
colors.description: Image featured is a screenshot from the palette's initial promotional YouTube video, found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDFjsMFojzs at timestamp 4:21.

colors.name: Lighter Skin Arm Swatches
colors.description: Image featured is a screenshot from the palette's initial promotional YouTube video, found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDFjsMFojzs at timestamp 5:01. The colors extracted from this image are specifically for the bottom arm of the person with the lighter skin tone.

colors.name: Darker Skin Arm Swatches
colors.description: Image featured is a screenshot from the palette's initial promotional YouTube video, found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDFjsMFojzs at timestamp 5:01. The colors extracted from this image are specifically for the top arm of the person with the darker skin tone.
